name: Gunslinger Of Tomorrow
description:
The gunslinger of tomorrow is a single player game, highly focused with core game play and the mind of not with the story. The plot resolves around the journey of a super human, with highly advanced genetics, may be not belonging to this planet, against the machines in order to save his life and fight for the remaining humanity in the chaotic environment of a technological, pandemic where machines being the masters rule and if not all then very high percentages of humans as slaves. Do you have enough valor and guts, to save the whole world from these destructive machines with nothing but a handful of crazy, blazing guns?

Controls:

Forward:  D
Backward: A
Pickup(Interact): G
Reload: R
Weapon Switch: F
Fire: LEFT_CLICK
Aim: RIGHT_CLICK

Note:- Controls can be changed as desired by the player. The above mentioned are the default Controls

Minimum Requirements:

Operating System:  Windows 7 64 Service Pack 1 Or Higher

RAM:  512MB 

Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6300 - 6 core x 1.87 GHZ Or Higher / AMD Athlon 7750 Dual-Core - 2 core x 2.7 GHZ Or Higher 

Video Card: No dedicated Video Card

Sound Card: 100% Direct X 9.0 compatible – Direct X 9.0 compatible supporting Dolby Digital Live

HDD Space: 1 GB

Note:

For providing a better Experience to our Audience, the Game is designed to run in the resolution of 1920x1080. Make sure that you have a GPU supporting, resolution of 1920x1080(FHD) and a display screen(Monitor or LED) which can display(render) at 1920x1080(FHD)
